code: import{useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import styles from'./styles.module.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ReviewSubmission=_ref=>{let{audiobookId,onReviewSubmitted}=_ref;const[rating,setRating]=useState(0);const[review,setReview]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{const response=await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/api/audiobooks/".concat(audiobookId,"/reviews"),{rating,review});onReviewSubmitted(response.data);setRating(0);setReview('');}catch(err){setError('Failed to submit review');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.reviewForm,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,class:styles.form,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Submit Your Review"}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:styles.error,children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.rating,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:styles.stars,children:[1,2,3,4,5].map(star=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:styles.star,onClick:()=>setRating(star),style:{color:star<=rating?'#f39c12':'#ccc'},children:"\u2605"},star))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:styles.review,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{id:"review",value:review,onChange:e=>setReview(e.target.value),rows:"4",placeholder:"Write your review here..."}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:styles.submitButton,children:"Submit"})]})]})});};export default ReviewSubmission;
